column1: #Text=If it appears racially motivated in any sense that is China's fault because they have no significant component of their population that are of non-Chinese ancestry.
#Text=Tell you what China develop the racial diversity so readily apparent in North America and then the tax won't look so racially motivated.
#Text=If you choose to stay so insular that's your own fault.
#Text=As it is the tax applies to everyone not just people in China.
